   <div id="content">
    <p>
    </p>
    <h1 class="mainpage">
     <a class="title" href="chez.html">
      (chez (chez scheme))
     </a>
    </h1>
    <p>
    </p>
    <h3>
     Chez Scheme is Now Open Source
    </h3>
    <p>
     Chez Scheme is now an open-source project, hosted at
     <a href="https://github.com/cisco/chezscheme">
      github.com/cisco/chezscheme
     </a>
     with a project page at
     <a href="https://cisco.github.io/ChezScheme">
      cisco.github.io/ChezScheme
     </a>
     .
Current information on Chez Scheme can be found there.
    </p>
    <p>
    </p>
    <h3>
     The Scheme Programming Language
    </h3>
    <p>
     Documentation for Chez Scheme comes in two parts.
The
     <span class="copyright">
      The Scheme Programming Language, 4th Edition
     </span>
     (TSPL), which
is a general introduction to and reference for Scheme.
It is available for order direct from
     <a href="https://mitpress.mit.edu/books/scheme-programming-language-fourth-edition" target="_blank">
      MIT
Press
     </a>
     and various online and local retailers.
The full text is available
     <a href="tspl4/">
      online
     </a>
     , along with
     <a href="tspl4-errata.html">
      errata
     </a>
     .
    </p>
    <p>
     The Chez Scheme User's Guide (CSUG) documents features specific to Chez Scheme.
A link to the latest version can be found in the
     <a href="https://cisco.github.io/ChezScheme">
      Chez Scheme Github project page
     </a>
     .
    </p>
    <p>
    </p>
   </div>
  </div>
 </body>
